spell.name: Accursed Blade
entries: You rest your hand on a weapon and empower it with a wretched curse. Attacks made with the weapon must subtract {@dice 1d4} from their attack rolls but deal {@damage 4d4} bonus necrotic damage on a hit.

As a bonus action after hitting a creature with the weapon, the weapon's wielder can attempt to impart some of the curse to that creature. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failure, the target must subtract {@dice 1d4} from all of its attack rolls and saving throws for the spell's duration, and the weapon's bonus damage is reduced by {@dice 1d4}. If the target becomes cursed, it can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending its curse on a success.
The spell ends if you cast it again.

spell.name: Acid Jet
entries: You blast a stream of acid outward, enveloping all creatures in a line 60 feet long and 5 feet wide. Creatures in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 12d4} acid damage on a failure or half as much on a success. A target that fails its saving throw takes an additional {@damage 6d4} acid damage at the end of its next turn, unless it or another creature within 5 feet spends an action to remove the acid.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the initial damage increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Alter Metal
entries: You point at a nonmagical metal object within range and dramatically change its properties. The object must be Huge or smaller, and canâ€™t be worn or carried. You can manipulate it in any number of the following ways:

items: You can stretch or compact it. You can halve its size, double its size, or anything in between. Its weight does not change, nor does the actual quantity of metal.
You can turn it into another metal of similar value.
You can reshape it into another object of similar size.
You can alter its strength, reducing its hit points to one-quarter or increasing them to four times the original.

spell.name: Aura of Iron
entries: You radiate a field of metallic magic, layering a thin layer of hard iron over creatures within range. Until the spell ends, the aura moves with you, centered on you. Each nonhostile creature in the aura (including you) has resistance to the next instance of nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage it takes. In addition, the next time it deals piercing or slashing damage, it can maximize one die of damage.
Both of these effects occur once, resetting at the start of each of your turns.

spell.name: Aura of Slaughter
entries: You draw upon a well of dark power and radiate it outward in a 30-foot radius, empowering your allies with dire intent. Until the spell ends, the aura moves with you, centered on you. When an ally starts its turn within the aura, it gains the following benefits:

items: The first time on its turn it hits with a melee attack, the target takes an additional {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage.
When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack, it gains {@dice 2d6} temporary hit points.

entries: At the end of each of its turns, the creature repeats the saving throw. It takes {@damage 2d6} slashing damage on a failed save, and the spell ends on a successful one.

spell.name: Auric Lance
entries: You fling a golden needle at a target within range, which expands into a deadly spear. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 10d8} piercing damage and gleams with a golden aura, granting advantage on all attacks against it until the start of your next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Axiomatic Artillery
entries: You open a conduit to a plane of pure order, and relay coordinates to a mighty piece of artillery secreted away there. Choose one creature you can see within range. While you maintain {@status concentration}, the cannon tracks the target and prepares to fire. At the start of your next turn, the cannon fires, opening a portal and blasting an energy beam through it at the target. The target takes 100 force damage. If you lose {@status concentration} before the cannon fires, the blast goes off prematurely, and the target takes half as much damage. If the target leaves your plane of existence, the spell ends.

spell.name: Banshee's Wail
entries: You emit an ear-splitting shriek which extends beyond mere sound and tears at the souls of all who hear it. Every creature within 30 feet must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes {@damage 10d8} necrotic damage and is {@condition frightened|SRD} of you for 1 minute. If it fails the save by 5 or more, a creature takes twice as much damage and is additionally {@condition stunned|SRD} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects. A {@condition frightened|SRD} creature can make a Wisdom saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

spell.name: Bind Lesser Fiend
entries: You chant a vile spell, conjuring up a single fiend to serve you. The spell conjures one fiend which uses the {@creature Bound Fiend|SoManySpells} stat block below, and you select either the Imp, Quasit, or Vargouille option when you cast the spell. In combat, the fiend shares your initiative count but takes its turns immediately after yours. It can't be dismissed and lasts for 1 hour after its summoning. It disappears when reduced to 0 hit points.

The fiend is an ally to you and your companions and hostile to all other creatures. If you lose {@status concentration} on the spell, it does not disappear. Instead, it becomes hostile toward you and your companions.

m.text: a blasphemous statuette of a fiend, worth at least 200 gp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, certain values increase in its stat block.

ac.special: 12 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

hp.special: 10 (imp) or 15 (quasit & vargouille) + 5 for each spell level above 2nd

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Shapechanger (Imp and Quasit Only)
entries: The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a rat, a raven, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any items it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

trait.name: Poison Claws (Quasit Only)
entries: The first time a creature takes damage from the quasit, it must make a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failure, it is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. It can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns.

trait.name: Shriek (Vargouille Only, {@recharge 5-6})
entries: At the end of its turn in combat, the vargouille shrieks. Each humanoid and beast within 30 feet of the vargouille and able to hear it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC be {@condition frightened|SRD} until the end of the vargouilleâ€™s next turn.

trait.name: Rotting Bite (Vargouille Only)
entries: Once per turn, the vargouille can attempt to inflict a decaying curse with its bite. The target must make a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failure, it cannot recover hit points for 1 minute. It can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fiend makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Sting (Imp Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1 + summonSpellLevel} piercing damage + {@damage 1d10} poison damage.

action.name: Claws (Quasit Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d4 + summonSpellLevel} piercing damage + {@damage 2d4} poison damage.

action.name: Bite (Vargouille Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} piercing damage.
